{{Wired embedded system |brand=Ubiquiti Networks |model=EdgeRouter |revision=Infinity (ER-8-XG) |asin=B07D1C6GPB |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |price=1599 |type=router |pwr_v=110-240 |pwr_amp=1.0 |pwr_conn=C13 |pwr_vac=true |pwr_ac_hz=50/60 |cpu1_brand=Cavium |cpu1_model=CN7360 |cpu1_cspeed=1.8 GHz |cpu1_cores=16 |fla1=4 GiB |fla1_model=eMMC |ram1=16 GiB |ram1_model=DDR4 |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0, SFP |expansion_usb_num=1 |expansion_sfp_num=8 |jtag=yes |serial=yes,, console port,, (RJ45),, (115200 8N1) |eth_cpu=true |lan_speed=10GbE |lan_ports=8 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=1 |flags=SFP port |stock_boot=U-Boot |stock_os=Linux;;EdgeOS; |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=ubnt |default_pass=ubnt }} {{TagLine|Ubiquiti Networks EdgeRouter Infinity (ER-8-XG)}} :''8-Port Router with 10G SFP+/RJ45 Ports'' (Rack 19") :[https://www.ubnt.com/edgemax/edgerouter-infinity/ Product page] {{•}} [https://help.ubnt.com/hc/en-us/categories/200321064-EdgeMAX Support page] {{•}} [https://www.ubnt.com/downloads/datasheets/edgemax/EdgeRouter_ER-8-XG_DS.pdf Datasheet]
{{See also|Cavium|MediaTek|Ubiquiti Networks}}
*[[Ubiquiti Networks EdgeRouter Infinity (ER-8-XG)]] • [https://www.ubnt.com/edgemax/edgerouter-infinity/ PPage] :CPU: [[Cavium]] [https://cavium.com/octeon-III-CN73XX-CN72XX-mips64-processors.html CN7360] @1.8GHz ''Octeon III'' (16x Core MIPS64) :8-Port 10G SFP+ Router (80Gbps), 4GB Flash, 16GB (DDR4) RAM :Ports: 1x GbE (RJ45), 8x 10G SFP+, 1x USB 3.0, console; 18Mpps
===Model comparison=== :;[https://unifi-xg.ubnt.com/usg-xg-8 ''UniFi Gateway'' Model Comparison] *[[Ubiquiti Networks UniFi Security Gateway XG 8 (USG-XG-8)]] • [https://unifi-xg.ubnt.com/usg-xg-8 PPage] :CPU: [[Cavium]] [https://cavium.com/octeon-III-CN73XX-CN72XX-mips64-processors.html CN7360] @1.8GHz ''Octeon III'' (16x Core MIPS64) :8-Port 10G SFP+ Gateway (80Gbps), 4GB Flash, 16GB DDR4 RAM :Ports: 1x GbE, 8x SFP, 1x USB 3.0, Console; Performance: 18Mpps *[[Ubiquiti Networks UniFi Security Gateway Pro 4 (USG-PRO-4)]] • [https://www.ubnt.com/unifi-routing/unifi-security-gateway-pro-4/ PPage] :CPU: [[Cavium]] CN6120 @1GHz ''Octeon II'' (Dual Core MIPS64) :4-Port RJ45/SFP Combo Gateway (4Gbps), 2GB DDR3 RAM :Ports: 4x GbE, 2x SFP, 1x USB 2.0, Console; Performance: 1.8Mpps *[[Ubiquiti Networks UniFi Security Gateway (USG)]] • [https://www.ubnt.com/unifi-routing/usg/ PPage] :Enterprise Gateway Router with Gigabit Ethernet (e100/e110) :CPU: [[Cavium]] CN5020 @500MHz ''Octeon +'' (Dual Core MIPS64) :Ports: 3x GbE, Console, 512MB DDR2 RAM; Performance: 0.7Mpps
